mapper.insert: insert into BOOKWRITER.T_PATIENT (PATIENT_NO, PATIENT_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ID, PHONE_NUMBER, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DRUG_ALLERGY_HISTORY, JOB_INFO) values (#{patientNo,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{drugAllergyHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jobInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update BOOKWRITER.T_PATIENT set PATIENT_NAME = #{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, BIRTHDAY = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, PHONE_NUMBER = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZIP_CODE = #{zipCode,jdbcType=CHAR}, DRUG_ALLERGY_HISTORY = #{drugAllergyHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JOB_INFO = #{jobInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PATIENT_NO = #{patientNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select PATIENT_NO, PATIENT_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ID, PHONE_NUMBER, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DRUG_ALLERGY_HISTORY, JOB_INFO from BOOKWRITER.T_PATIENT where PATIENT_NO = #{patientNo,jdbcType=CHAR}
select PATIENT_NO, PATIENT_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ID, PHONE_NUMBER, ADDRESS, ZIP_CODE, DRUG_ALLERGY_HISTORY, JOB_INFO from BOOKWRITER.T_PATIENT
